title: ITT i tell you what i dislike about you
body:
hi, dorks

you may remember this thread that i made three months ago where i told you my honest opinion of you:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/Es9z9uRH-itt-i-give-my-honest-opinion-of-you

as shitty as the topic was, it turned out to be a great social experiment, so, with your permission, i'd like to try it again

**caveat**: there will be situations where there i don't have enough information at my disposal to dislike anything about certain posters. if i have not replied to your post within an hour or so, assume this is the case.

step right up. i know you're curious

just to make this even more circlejerky, i will list people whose posts i've seen but can offer no insight on:

> Chicks Dig 3v3
> GG Yoona Im
>Sweetheart Annie
> yokazo
> IAintDarius
> How Do You Meta
> insaiyanbacca
> Rockman
> Zastie
> Workshop Shaco
> VirginRivenMain
> Incognonymous
> Eldeeo
> LukeTheSheppy
> Godot
> Chortle
> Hero of Ideals
> Visys
> Chaoticbanana
> Turbo Williams
> IRLPurpleBUFF
> Chairman Rock
> GIJose65
> Sound Voltex
> Garens Harem
> mirAcIe
> HateDaddy
> Fear Popo
> R3volver
> Insanity Kiwi
> Wezz
> dragondude23
> YOU BEEN WARNED
> Tyrannus0
> Vacus

this list will be edited during times where the thread is super active and it's easier to just put names here. otherwise, i'll try to tell people "idk" in the best way possible
